Description / Focus: Record customer payments; check daily cash balance impact
Issue receipts for payments; validate proper documentation
Track payments and proceeds by date and customer; verify accurate financial reporting
Look up orders by ID; initialize prepayments; verify payment status
Record bank deposits/withdrawals; reconcile with system records
Manage customer credits; apply payments to credits automatically
Verify daily cash balance; generate daily cash reports
Export financial data to Excel/PDF; track transactions by type
Reconcile PDF marketplace orders; update client balances efficiently
Create purchase orders for suppliers; verify correct data entry and order creation
Edit or cancel purchase orders before confirmation; verify restrictions and notifications
Track purchase order status (accepted, shipped, delayed); confirm status changes display properly
Send and receive messages with suppliers regarding orders; verify message delivery and responses
Check stock levels before placing orders; ensure accuracy of quantities and stock status
Verify notifications for low stock; test timing and reliability of alerts
Initiate returned merchandise requests; verify linkage with suppliers and stock updates
Track service requests related to purchased products; ensure clear status tracking and closure
Compare prices of the same product from multiple suppliers; test response speed
Access supplier contact info; verify ability to reach managers quickly via provided data
View sales statistics and reports; verify accuracy and data completeness
Track order volumes and revenue by day, week, and month; validate date filters and data grouping
Review financial summaries (payments, balances, credits); confirm consistent totals across modules
Monitor user activities and access logs; ensure visibility and accuracy of user actions
Receive and view notifications of critical system errors; test visibility and alert timing
Analyze product performance (sales, returns, popularity); confirm report generation and accuracy
Review customer feedback and complaints; verify sorting, filtering, and response functionality
Review website traffic statistics, trends, and report export options
Verify news updates and banners reflect current promotions; test editing and publication workflows
